ygData.subject: Re: fighting twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: From your description - it s sounds to me like you are soloing?  While there are others here who adamantly disagree with me - IMHO (oops In-My-Humble-Opinion)
ygData.messageBody:
From your description - it's sounds to me like you are soloing? While there
are others here who adamantly disagree with me - IMHO (oops
In-My-Humble-Opinion) Bards are a horrible class to try to solo. You should
be grouping. Make some friends group with them. Once you can have people
you can trust - ask if they will hold your loot for you...

At level 11 - I recall I was in medium-to-large sized group fighting
monsters that were all red to me.

Level 11 means you've invested a good amount of time - I think it would be a
tough to start all over..

Slyde of Xegony


> From: John Buenavides <jbuenavides@...>
>
<snip>

> Well, anyway, back to the present. I'm level 11 now, and the only
> monsters I can get exp from are those that do incredible amounts of
> damage and have bash skills to boot. I come out at half life with
> blues, and blacks can kill me if I don't kite them around the block a
> few times while I heal up.
>
> One time after getting easily killed by a darkweed, I decided to take
> the banded out of cold storage. Lo and behold. Darkweed, easy solo.
> Young Kodiak, can't even hit me enough times before it starts
> running away. I was a happy poacher with two HQ bear pelts, and four
> HQ cat pelts. Granted, I was encumbered at 100 lbs, but when I'm
> fighting, my two songs give just enough strength not to suffer any
> encumberance penalties.
>
